name: midsummer, space
description:
Menu at the start: Press space bar to begin, though if you have a very fast or slow machine, you can tweak the settings with the arrow keys.

Music can be toggled with 'M'. (I know it's easy to make sound effects, I keep going on about it, but this time I didn't do any myself...)

Movement with 'tank controls' WASD (shift to strafe). Or mouse (click on ground & move towards the edges of the screen for rotation.)

Click to interact with objects,

You don't need to manage your inventory (at all), if you have it, the right item will be used automagically.

I tried to make it so that you can't really get stuck, but it's not extensively been tested.

It's nicer to keep your light with you, the light-stands are basically just to show off in the current version.

Full walkthrough to follow, when it's not 4 o'clock in the morning.
